name: ChangeBackgroundColorChoices
shortdesc: Background color options for changed text.

property.name: CHANGE_BACKGROUND_USES_GALLEY_BACKGROUND_COLOR
property.shortdesc: The background color for changed text is the same as the galley background color.

property.name: CHANGE_BACKGROUND_USES_USER_COLOR
property.shortdesc: The background color for changed text is the same as the color assigned to the current user.

property.name: CHANGE_BACKGROUND_USES_CHANGE_PREF_COLOR
property.shortdesc: The background color for changed text is the same as the track changes preferences background color. For information, see background color for added text, background color for deleted text, or background color for moved text.
